channel.title: Log in and password protect pages help
channel.description:
Im looking for a script that using a simple log in and register, mabe something using the forums login.pgp and register.php to sign in.. if not thats fine, But I need something that when you log in, new pages appear in the navigation that you can acces....
anyone got an idea?

item.title: Log in and password protect pages help
item.dc:creator: @Cabby Cabby
item.description:
@Cabby wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:2, topic:74131”]You can do this very easy with an htaccess file.

http://www.freewebmasterhelp.com/tutorials/htaccess/3

Use this to encrypt the password: http://www.kxs.net/support/htaccess_pw.html[/quote]

Oooh, I could use this

Read full topic
